title: Magnetism - Sum of forces on wires

content.question: Which expression correctly indicates the magnitude and direction of the force exerted by the magnetic field on the group of wires?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 I L B" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>B</mi></math> toward the bottom of the figure
<math alttext="2 I L B" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>B</mi></math> toward the top of the figure
<math alttext="6 I L B" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>B</mi></math> toward the bottom of the figure
<math alttext="6 I L B" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>B</mi></math> toward the top of the figure

content.answer: <math alttext="2 I L B" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>B</mi></math> toward the top of the figure

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
